update.FilterExpression: `rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` not like "N%" AND ( `rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` in ("OS","SU","EN","SQ","EA","WT","SN","TW","TC",HD") OR (`rq_rqitm_2`.status_code in ("AL","PA","PK" ) AND `rq_rqitm_2`.tailoring_for is null) )

select * from rq_rqitm_2 WHERE `rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` not like "N%" AND ( `rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` in ("OS","SU","EN","SQ","EA","WT","SN","TW","TC","HD") OR (`rq_rqitm_2`.status_code in ("AL","PA","PK" ) AND `rq_rqitm_2`.tailoring_for is null) )

`rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` not like "N%" AND ( `rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` in ("OS","SU","EN","SQ","EA","WT","SN","TW","TC","HD") OR (`rq_rqitm_2`.status_code in ("AL","PA","PK" ) AND `rq_rqitm_2`.tailoring_for is null) )
`rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` not like "N%" AND NOT (`rq_rqitm_2`.status_code in ("AL","PA","PK" ) AND `rq_rqitm_2`.tailoring_for is null)
`rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` not like "N%" AND (`rq_rqitm_2`.status_code not in ("AL","PA","PK" ) AND `rq_rqitm_2`.tailoring_for is not null)

`rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` not like "N%"
AND (NOT (`rq_rqitm_2`.status_code in ("AL","PA","PK") AND `rq_rqitm_2`.tailoring_for is not null))

`rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` not like "N%" AND ( `rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` in ("OS","SU","EN","SQ","EA","WT","SN","TW","HD") OR (`rq_rqitm_2`.status_code in ("AL","PA","PK" ) AND `rq_rqitm_2`.tailoring_for is null) )

`rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` not like "N%"
AND (NOT (`rq_rqitm_2`.status_code in ("AL","PA","PK") AND `rq_rqitm_2`.tailoring_for is not null)) AND `rq_rqitm_2`.`status_code` <> "TC"

update.Formula: ( Select r.rank_desc from rq_ranks r Where r.rank_code = COALESCE(staff_roles.rank_code,role.rank_code,staff_u.rank_code))
( Select r.rank_desc from rq_ranks r Where r.rank_code = COALESCE(staff_roles.rank_code,role.rank_code,staff_u.rank_code))

insert.Name: LocalBudgetCode
insert.Formula: COALESCE(staff_roles.cost_centre,role.cost_centre ,(select l.budget_ind from rq_locns l where l.location_code = `staff_u`.`location_code` ))
insert.Label: Local Budget Code

update.Formula: COALESCE(role.cost_centre,role1.cost_centre ,(select l.budget_ind from rq_locns l where l.location_code = `staff_u`.`location_code` ))
COALESCE(role.cost_centre,role1.cost_centre ,(select l.budget_ind from rq_locns l where l.location_code = `staff_u`.`location_code` ))
( Select r.rank_desc from rq_ranks r Where r.rank_code = COALESCE(role.rank_code,role1.rank_code,staff_u.rank_code))
,COALESCE(`location_code`.location_desc,(select l.location_desc from rq_locns l where l.location_code = `staff_u`.`location_code` ))
COALESCE(`location_code`.location_desc,(select l.location_desc from rq_locns l where l.location_code = `staff_u`.`location_code` ))

BuildRoleName(`role1`.`description`, COALESCE(`role_location`.location_desc,`staff_ulocation`.location_desc ) , ( Select r.rank_desc from rq_ranks r Where r.rank_code = COALESCE(role.rank_code,role1.rank_code,staff_u.rank_code)) )

BuildRoleName(`role1`.`description`, COALESCE(`role_location`.location_desc,`staff_ulocation`.location_desc ) , ( Select r.rank_desc from rq_ranks r Where r.rank_code = COALESCE(role.rank_code,role1.rank_code,staff_u.rank_code)) )
( Select r.rank_desc from rq_ranks r Where r.rank_code = COALESCE(role.rank_code,role1.rank_code,staff_u.rank_code))
